Group hierarchy: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
VPC - Increase data processed by gateway per month
EC2 - Increase number of instances, CPU and memory of each instance
RDS - Increase RDS storage and have a matching backup storage
CloudWatch - Add the service to monitor metrics, logs and events
Web Application Firewall - Add the service for web security and access control
